title: EVANGELION: DEATH (TRUE)²
cast: Megumi Ogata, Kotono Mitsuishi, Megumi Hayashibara, Yuko Miyamura, Yuriko Yamaguchi, Fumihiko Tachiki, Motomu Kiyokawa, Koichi Yamadera, Takehito Koyasu, Hiro Yuki, Miki Nagasawa, Mugihito, Akira Ishida
description: Fifteen years after the Second Impact, apathetic teen Shinji joins his father's group NERV to fight the Angels. But the truth may destroy them all.

title: Hero
cast: Takeshi Kaneshiro, Yuen Biao, Valerie Chow, Jessica Hester Hsuan, Tak Yuen, Wah Yuen, Corey Yuen
description: A pugilist from Shantung struggles to rise to the top of the Shanghai triad ladder, where his stellar martial arts talents can shine.

title: Look Out, Officer
cast: Stephen Chow, Bill Tung, Stanley Sui-Fan Fung, Vivian Chan, Indra Leech, Amy Yip
description: An officer killed on the job returns to Earth as a ghost to solve his own murder and seek justice with the help of a rookie cop and some funky magic.

title: Passenger 57
cast: Wesley Snipes, Bruce Payne, Tom Sizemore, Alex Datcher, Bruce Greenwood, Elizabeth Hurley, Michael Horse, Marc Macaulay, Ernie Lively
description: Air marshal John Cutter must stop notorious terrorist Charles Rane from killing hostages on board a flight that should have delivered Rane to jail.

title: Rumble in the Bronx
cast: Jackie Chan, Anita Mui, Françoise Yip, Bill Tung, Marc Akerstream, Garvin Cross, Morgan Lam, Ailen Sit
description: During a visit to the Bronx to help out at his uncle's store, a cheerful martial arts expert springs into action when a gang terrorizes the shop.

title: The Bare-Footed Kid
cast: Aaron Kwok, Lung Ti, Maggie Cheung, Chien-lien Wu, Paul Chun, Kenneth Tsang
description: While working at a family friend's business, a penniless orphan draws the attention of a corrupt competitor and is torn between divided loyalties.

title: The End of Evangelion
cast: Megumi Ogata, Kotono Mitsuishi, Megumi Hayashibara, Yuko Miyamura, Yuriko Yamaguchi, Fumihiko Tachiki, Motomu Kiyokawa, Koichi Yamadera, Takehito Koyasu, Hiro Yuki, Miki Nagasawa, Maria Kawamura, Mugihito, Akira Ishida
description: Seele orders an all-out attack on NERV, aiming to destroy the Evas before Gendo can trigger Third Impact and Instrumentality under his control.
